name: My Favourite Films Online Quiz | Movies Grab Bag | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the job of Juliet Stephenson's character Nina in 'Truly Madly Deeply'?
questions.explanation:
Translator.

	Juliet Stephenson lives in the same north London district where the film is set.

questions.text: In 'Four Weddings and a Funeral', what is Duckface's real name?
questions.explanation:
Henrietta.

	Despite the nickname in the film, the actress Anna Chancellor has been a successful model.

questions.text: Which literary heroine has been played on film by both Gwyneth Paltrow and Kate Beckinsale?
questions.explanation:
Emma Woodhouse.

	Gwyneth Paltrow's English accent is also deployed in 'Sliding Doors' and 'Shakespeare in Love'.

questions.text: Which song gives its title to a Steve Martin film?
questions.explanation:
All of Me.

	"Roxanne" is another Steve Martin film whose title is also a song.

questions.text: In 'Brief Encounter', what is the name of Trevor Howard's wife?
questions.explanation:
Madeleine.

	Madeleine never appears in the film.

questions.text: In 'Notting Hill', what nationality is Hugh Grant's flatmate?
questions.explanation:
Welsh.

	Bizarrely for a film set in the home of Carnival, only a few minor American characters in 'Notting Hill' are black.

questions.text: What is the name of John Cleese's character in 'A Fish called Wanda'?
questions.explanation:
Archibald Leach.

	Archibald Leach is the birth name of Cary Grant.

questions.text: Who plays Harrison Ford's wife in 'Regarding Henry'?
Which actress's experiences inspired 'Postcards from the Edge'?
questions.explanation:
Carrie Fisher.

	Carrie Fisher is the daughter of Eddie Fisher and Debbie Reynolds.

questions.text: Which industrial town is the setting for 'The Full Monty'?
